name: UiPathTest
description: Runs an existing test set on Orchestrator, or packages, deploys and executes test cases as a transient test set in one go, by specifying the path to a UiPath test project.
author: UiPath

inputs.name: testTarget
inputs.label: Choose a test execution method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the test execution target, a pre-existing test set on the Orchestrator or the tests in a project at a given path, which will be executed as part of a transient test set.

inputs.name: orchestratorConnection
inputs.label: Orchestrator connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: A service connection to the Orchestrator instance on which we will run the tests.

inputs.name: testProjectPath
inputs.label: Test project path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the location of a test project to be deployed in Orchestrator and executed as part of a transient test set.

inputs.name: parametersFilePath
inputs.label: Input Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the location of a input parameters json file to override input arguments for a transient test set.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the environment onto which the package will be deployed as a test process. For the project and environment with existing test processes, the processes will be updated to use the latest project version. Required when using a classic folder, otherwise not applicable.

inputs.name: testSet
inputs.label: Test set
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of a pre-existing test set on the Orchestrator.

inputs.name: folderName
inputs.label: Orchestrator folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the folder to deploy to. If the folder is a classic folder and you would like to execute a transient test set, you will also need to set the environment. For modern folders, the environment is not required.

inputs.name: testReportDestination
inputs.label: Test results output path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the output path of the test results, e.g. Output\testResults.xml. The results are output in JUnit format. If not specified, the results are output to the artifact staging directory as UiPathResults.xml. The output is in JUnit format.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the test execution timeout in seconds.

messages.ErrorsOcurred: One or more errors occurred while running the tests.
messages.InternalErrors: Internal error, did not find test results output file on the agent.
messages.UploadingTestResults: Uploading test results to Azure DevOps...
messages.ErrorParsingTestExecUrl: Error while parsing test run url
